Workflow.Name: Daily Consolidated Tasks List
Workflow.Description: Generate a daily consolidated task list - based on items in Outlook Tasks, Microsoft To Do, and Planner - and schedule time on your calendar for those tasks. Learn more at aka.ms/consolidatedtasklist. ** REQUIRED: MS Power User environment or higher. **

Description.description: Generate a daily consolidated task list - based on items in Outlook Tasks, Microsoft To Do, and Planner - and schedule time on your calendar for those tasks. Learn more at aka.ms/consolidatedtasklist. ** REQUIRED: MS Power User environment or higher. **
